billingManagementState.description: The state determines whether users from the associated tenant can be assigned roles for commerce activities like viewing and downloading invoices, managing payments, and making purchases.

displayName.description: The name of the associated tenant.

provisioningManagementState.description: The state determines whether subscriptions and licenses can be provisioned in the associated tenant. It can be set to 'Pending' to initiate a billing request.

tenantId.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a tenant.

productId.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a product.

skuId.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a sku.

objectId.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a user in a tenant.

tenantId.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a tenant.

BillingAccountPolicyProperties.description: A policy at billing account scope.

enterpriseAgreementPolicies.description: The policies for Enterprise Agreement enrollments.

marketplacePurchases.description: The policy that controls whether Azure marketplace purchases are allowed.

policies.description: List of all policies defined at the billing scope.

reservationPurchases.description: The policy that controls whether Azure reservation purchases are allowed.

savingsPlanPurchases.description: The policy that controls whether users with Azure savings plan purchase are allowed.

BillingAccountPolicyPropertiesEnterprise.description: The policies for Enterprise Agreement enrollments.

accountOwnerViewCharges.description: The policy that controls whether account owner can view charges.

authenticationType.description: The state showing the enrollment auth level.

departmentAdminViewCharges.description: The policy that controls whether department admin can view charges.

BillingProfilePolicyProperties.description: A policy at billing profile scope.

enterpriseAgreementPolicies.description: The policies for Enterprise Agreement enrollments.

invoiceSectionLabelManagement.description: The policy that controls invoice section label management at invoice section scope. This is allowed by default.

marketplacePurchases.description: The policy that controls whether Azure marketplace purchases are allowed.

policies.description: List of all policies defined at the billing scope.

reservationPurchases.description: The policy that controls whether Azure reservation purchases are allowed.

savingsPlanPurchases.description: The policy that controls whether users with Azure savings plan purchase are allowed.

viewCharges.description: The policy that controls whether the users in customer's organization can view charges at pay-as-you-go prices.

BillingProfilePolicyPropertiesEnterprise.description: The policies for Enterprise Agreement enrollments.

accountOwnerViewCharges.description: The policy that controls whether account owner can view charges.

authenticationType.description: The state showing the enrollment auth level.

departmentAdminViewCharges.description: The policy that controls whether department admin can view charges.

currentPaymentTerm.description: The current payment term of the billing profile.

displayName.description: The name of the billing profile.

enabledAzurePlans.description: Information about the enabled azure plans.

indirectRelationshipInfo.description: Identifies the billing profile that is linked to another billing profile in indirect purchase motion.

invoiceEmailOptIn.description: Flag controlling whether the invoices for the billing profile are sent through email.

invoiceRecipients.description: The list of email addresses to receive invoices by email for the billing profile.

poNumber.description: The default purchase order number that will appear on the invoices generated for the billing profile.

shipTo.description: The default address where the products are shipped, or the services are being used. If a ship to is not specified for a product or a subscription, then this address will be used.

soldTo.description: The address of the individual or organization that is responsible for the billing account.

tags.description: Dictionary of metadata associated with the resource. Maximum key/value length supported of 256 characters. Keys/value should not empty value nor null. Keys can not contain < > % & \ ? /

companyName.description: Company name. Optional for MCA Individual (Pay-as-you-go).

country.description: Country code uses ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 format.

firstName.description: First name. Optional for MCA Enterprise.

isValidAddress.description: Indicates if the address is incomplete.

lastName.description: Last name. Optional for MCA Enterprise.

BillingProfilePropertiesCurrentPaymentTe.description: The current payment term of the billing profile.

endDate.description: The date on when the defined 'Payment Term' will end and is always in UTC.

startDate.description: The date on when the defined 'Payment Term' will be effective from and is always in UTC.

term.description: Represents duration in netXX format. Always in days.

BillingProfilePropertiesIndirectRelation.description: Identifies the billing profile that is linked to another billing profile in indirect purchase motion.

billingAccountName.description: The billing account name of the partner or the customer for an indirect motion.

billingProfileName.description: The billing profile name of the partner or the customer for an indirect motion.

displayName.description: The display name of the partner or customer for an indirect motion.

BillingProfilePropertiesShipTo.description: The default address where the products are shipped, or the services are being used. If a ship to is not specified for a product or a subscription, then this address will be used.

companyName.description: Company name. Optional for MCA Individual (Pay-as-you-go).

country.description: Country code uses ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 format.

firstName.description: First name. Optional for MCA Enterprise.

isValidAddress.description: Indicates if the address is incomplete.

lastName.description: Last name. Optional for MCA Enterprise.

BillingProfilePropertiesSoldTo.description: The address of the individual or organization that is responsible for the billing account.

companyName.description: Company name. Optional for MCA Individual (Pay-as-you-go).

country.description: Country code uses ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 format.

firstName.description: First name. Optional for MCA Enterprise.

isValidAddress.description: Indicates if the address is incomplete.

lastName.description: Last name. Optional for MCA Enterprise.

BillingRequestProperties.description: A request submitted by a user to manage billing. Users with an owner role on the scope can approve or decline these requests.

additionalInformation.description: Additional information for the billing request.

createdBy.description: The principal of the entity who created the request.

decisionReason.description: The reason to approve or decline the request.

lastUpdatedBy.description: The principal of the entity who last updated the request.

recipients.description: The recipients of the billing request.

requestScope.description: The billing scope for which the request was submitted (ex. '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountName}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileName}').

reviewedBy.description: The principal of the request reviewer. Will only be set if request is approved.

BillingRequestPropertiesCreatedBy.description: The principal of the entity who created the request.

objectId.description: The object id of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

upn.description: The user principal name of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

BillingRequestPropertiesLastUpdatedBy.description: The principal of the entity who last updated the request.

objectId.description: The object id of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

upn.description: The user principal name of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

BillingRequestPropertiesReviewedBy.description: The principal of the request reviewer. Will only be set if request is approved.

objectId.description: The object id of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

upn.description: The user principal name of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

BillingRoleAssignmentProperties.description: The properties of the billing role assignment.

principalId.description: The object id of the user to whom the role was assigned.

principalPuid.description: The principal PUID of the user to whom the role was assigned.

principalTenantId.description: The principal tenant id of the user to whom the role was assigned.

roleDefinitionId.description: The ID of the role definition.

scope.description: The scope at which the role was assigned.

userAuthenticationType.description: The authentication type of the user, whether Organization or MSA, of the user to whom the role was assigned. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

userEmailAddress.description: The email address of the user to whom the role was assigned. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

autoRenew.description: Indicates whether auto renewal is turned on or off for a product.

beneficiary.description: The beneficiary of the billing subscription.

beneficiaryTenantId.description: The provisioning tenant of the subscription.

billingFrequency.description: The billing frequency in ISO8601 format of product in the subscription. Example: P1M, P3M, P1Y

billingProfileId.description: The fully qualified ID that uniquely identifies a billing profile.

consumptionCostCenter.description: The cost center applied to the subscription. This field is only available for consumption subscriptions of Microsoft Customer Agreement or Enterprise Agreement Type billing accounts.

customerId.description: The fully qualified ID that uniquely identifies a customer.

displayName.description: The name of the billing subscription.

invoiceSectionId.description: The fully qualified ID that uniquely identifies an invoice section.

productTypeId.description: Id of the product for which the subscription is purchased.

provisioningTenantId.description: The tenant in which the subscription is provisioned.

quantity.description: The quantity of licenses or fulfillment units for the subscription.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the product for which the subscription is purchased. This field is is only available  for Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

systemOverrides.description: System imposed policies that regulate behavior of the subscription.

termDuration.description: The duration in ISO8601 format for which you can use the subscription. Example: P1M, P3M, P1Y

policies.description: List of all policies defined at the billing scope.

viewCharges.description: The policy that controls whether the users in customer's organization can view charges at pay-as-you-go prices.

recipientEmailId.description: The email ID of the recipient to whom the transfer request is sent.

displayName.description: The name of the invoice section.

reasonCode.description: Reason for the specified invoice section status.

state.description: Identifies the status of an invoice section.

tags.description: Dictionary of metadata associated with the resource. Maximum key/value length supported of 256 characters. Keys/value should not empty value nor null. Keys can not contain < > % & \ ? /

targetCloud.description: Identifies the cloud environments that are associated with an invoice section. This is a system managed optional field and gets updated as the invoice section gets associated with accounts in various clouds.

recipientEmailId.description: The email ID of the recipient to whom the transfer request is sent.

resellerId.description: Optional MPN ID of the reseller for transfer requests that are sent from a Microsoft Partner Agreement billing account.

scope.description: The scope at which the policy is defined.

Principal.description: A principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

objectId.description: The object id of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

upn.description: The user principal name of the principal who has interacted with a billing entity.

SystemOverrides.description: System imposed policies that regulate behavior of the subscription.
